translations: n.面纱；面纱布料；罩以面纱
v.用面纱遮掩；带面纱（veil 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: I realized there was no fog veiling my window.
sentences.translation: 我意识到，我的窗没有被云雾遮蔽。

sentences.sentence: It is only hidden by the veiling and projecting power of Maya.
sentences.translation: 它只是隐藏在面纱背后，投射出摩耶的力量。

sentences.sentence: She is an instance of the first phase, which Cooke calls "self-veiling."
sentences.translation: 她就是第一阶段的一个例子，库克称之为“自我遮蔽。”
